description: Mobile techniques used by Concipit1248, ATT&CK software S0426 v1.0
name: Concipit1248 (S0426)

techniques.comment: [Concipit1248](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0426) requests permissions to use the device camera.(Citation: TrendMicro Coronavirus Updates)
[Concipit1248](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0426) can collect device photos.(Citation: TrendMicro Coronavirus Updates)
[Concipit1248](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0426) has been distributed through the App Store.(Citation: TrendMicro Coronavirus Updates)
[Concipit1248](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0426) communicates with the C2 server using HTTP requests.(Citation: TrendMicro Coronavirus Updates)
